summary: The Navy is planning to spend $132 billion to develop and purchase 12 Columbia class nuclear-powered ballistic missile submarines—the largest and most complex submarine in its history. It plans to have the first one delivered in April 2027. title: Columbia Class Submarine: Program Lacks Essential Schedule Insight amid Continuing Construction Challenges
